en: A few beta-testers are reporting problems that you can't replicate on your computer. It seems they're running from a different operating system, but you don't have access to a computer with that system. However, only a small amount of people use this operating system, so it might be something you can put off until later. Should you buy a new computer to test it, or let it go?
When you finally find the bug, you realize it could've been earth-shattering. You're grateful you caught it now.
You decide not to mess with it - you don't need to be spending a lot of money now, when you're not sure whether you'll be making it back!
